item.title: Introducing Egg.
item.description:
Because I can.

Everyone always tells you “don’t reinvent the wheel.” Use existing frameworks. Don’t waste time building what already exists. And they’re probably rightâ€”for most people, most of the time. You aren’t going to do it any better than x engineers.

But sometimes you need to prove to yourself (and any future potential employers) that you can actually build the wheel. Sometimes the best way to understand production-ready software is to build it yourself, exactly the way you want it to work. Sometimes problem-solving IS the point.
